author: Asst Editor
title: Like the Big Kids, Kindergartens Plan Protests for Gun Control - Wall Street Journal
text:
If children in kindergarten can practice active-shooter drills, then they can also walk out to call for safety, some parents and educators say.
Plans to protest on March 14, which began with high-school shooting survivors in Parkland, Fla., are spreading to include elementary schools. Schools are grappling with how to address the event with children as young as 5 years old and with finding ways for children who are too little to be told about school shootings to take part.
... RELATED VIDEO How Student Survivors Are Fueling a Gun-Control Movement In the wake of the Parkland, Fla., school shooting that left 17 people dead, student survivors have started a movement for greater gun control. Two students explain how social media, crowdfunding and political activism have helped spread their message. Photo: Getty Images To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
